law.catch_line: Acceptance and disposition of gifts and grants.
law.text: The secretary of the Cabinet for Health and Family Services shall be empowered to accept and expend gifts and grants from any source. Such moneys shall go into a trust and agency fund to be administered by the cabinet in furtherance of the purposes of the provisions of KRS 205.201 to 205.204.
law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 220, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 6, sec. 20, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 187, effective July 15, 1998. -- Created 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 207, sec. 2.
